duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform disassembly of fuel controls, governors, fuel, oil, and air accessories following technical data and written instructions.
Utilize hand tools and specialty tools for precision measurements on a daily basis.
Read and interpret technical data, drawings, and document maintenance records of repair work orders.
Comply with quality and safety requirements, contribute to meeting team KPIs, and identifying extra or missing parts.
Maintain an orderly and productive work environment and adapt to changing workloads based on customer requirements.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree or 3-4 years of relevant/technical work experience (Preferred: 5+ years of relevant/technical work experience in the aviation industry)
